attributes.action: carry out a review (carrying out reviews of failed policies is, after all, what our 'government' does best) AND make a public statement (which, again, is something within Mr McBroon's powers as 'our' Prime Minister) as to why it is acceptable for the people of Serbia to be allowed an opportunity to say whether or not they agree to 'closer ties to Europe', in a General Election, as announced today (8th March 2008) but it is absolutely NOT acceptable for the people of the UK (THE SUPPOSED HOME OF DEMOCRACY ON THIS PLANET) to be given the same opportunity to say if they agree with our elected representatives who quite clearly see their own future (and self enrichment) in Europe.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
Statements that don't actually request any action
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
